name: hackerui
description: HackerUI — a cyber-console environment by 3xecutable File

scripts.install-linux: npm install && cd src && npm install --ignore-scripts && ./../node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild -m . -f -w node-pty && cd ..
scripts.preinstall-windows: npm install --global --production windows-build-tools && npm install --global node-gyp && setx PYTHON "%USERPROFILE%\.windows-build-tools\python27\python.exe"
scripts.install-windows: npm install && cd src && npm install --ignore-scripts && ..\node_modules\.bin\electron-rebuild -m . -f -w node-pty && cd ..
scripts.prebuild-linux: rsync -a --info=progress2 src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-optional && ELECTRON_VER="$(node -p "require('../node_modules/electron/package.json').version")" && ARCH="${TARGET_ARCH:-$npm_config_arch}" && GYP_DEFINES=openssl_fips= ../node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild -m . -f -w node-pty -v $ELECTRON_VER ${ARCH:+--arch=$ARCH}
scripts.prebuild-darwin: rsync -a src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-optional && ELECTRON_VER="$(node -p "require('../node_modules/electron/package.json').version")" && ARCH="${TARGET_ARCH:-$npm_config_arch}" && GYP_DEFINES=openssl_fips= ../node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild -m . -f -w node-pty -v $ELECTRON_VER ${ARCH:+--arch=$ARCH}
scripts.prebuild-windows: mkdir prebuild-src && xcopy src\* prebuild-src\ /E /C /Q /Y && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install --ignore-scripts --no-optional && ..\node_modules\.bin\electron-rebuild -m . -f -w node-pty -v 12.2.2
scripts.test: npm install --ignore-scripts && rsync -a --info=progress2 src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install --ignore-scripts && snyk test && cd .. && rm -R prebuild-src
rsync -a --info=progress2 src/ prebuild-src --exclude node_modules && node prebuild-minify.js && cd prebuild-src && npm install --ignore-scripts && snyk test && cd .. && rm -R prebuild-src
scripts.update-file-icons: git submodule foreach git pull origin master && node file-icons-generator.js

author: 3xecutable File
